title: Rabbit stew with coconut cream
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons oil for frying', '1 rabbit, cleaned and cut into pieces', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 green pepper, seeded and sliced into strips', '1 red pepper, seeded and sliced into strips', '1 birdseye or piri piri chilli, seeded and minced', '1 large tomato - peeled, seeded and chopped', '400ml chicken stock', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '160ml coconut cream']
